summary:
Human connections fuel success. Let`s connect!
Mid-senior marketing & communications professional and business owner, keen on seeing opportunities. 7+ years of extensive professional experience in  • strategic communications • marketing • public and media relations • outreach and partnerships • campaign and event management • storytelling and content management • business development. Passionate about sustainability, innovations and technology. 
Focused on deepening my knowledge in sociology, psychology and business communications.
A loving mom to Alexander (4 y.o.) and a "foreign" wife and best friend to Durk Steenhuizen (XX y.o.).

•	Organized brand events for customers and business partners, launching new products or presenting brand strategy.', 'title': 'Marketing communications and content manager Eartern Europe', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2677, 'name': "McDonald's Corporation", 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHWxquJ9PJxvw/company-logo_400_400/0/1552140114610?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=bg-r23hlrYLnVrLLkLT3yXeACGd1OqHYZ213c3mPpyA', 'url': "https://www.linkedin.com/company/mcdonald's-corporation/", 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Moscow, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': "McDonald's", 'description': '•	Designed a strategic marketing communication plan to strengthen the brand positioning and increase positive image in 5 key regions by means of promotional content,
•	Next to that, I assisted in holding media training for the company`s spokespersons, developed Intranet pages and deployed content for corporate social media.
•	Managed media relations in different regions through initiation of image publications, excursions and presentations at  
        the brand`s restaurants, holding press-conferences, managing the requests for brand & corporate content;
•	Deployed McDonald`s largest charity event in Russia- the McHappy Day - in 11 cities, including budgeting, management of media and celebrities’ appearances, development of on-the-spot content and social media promotion.', 'title': 'National marketing communications manager', 'employment_type': 'Permanent'}]}, {'company': {'id': 5057, 'name': 'Ketchum', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG00c7yoc0Mqg/company-logo_400_400/0/1677176482329?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=aHkEChtj5ooIJWHDyVYZqmO1rKObbvRUpWT7ARlE9jc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ketchum/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Moscow, Russian Federation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Ketchum', 'description': 'This position was a unique opportunity to work in-house for one of the agency`s biggest clients as a full-time member of the P&G corporate communications team. My SOR included development and deployment of the P&G Olympic sponsorship communication strategy and tactics for Sochi-2014. This communication plan was designed to receive a wide promotion in mass media of P&G`s worldwide renowned “Thank you mom!” corporate campaign with in-depth integration of the company`s “olympic” brands. 
At different stages of the communication plan activation, I was managing the creation of the corporate content by means of writing own PR materials, reviewing paid articles and preparing interviews with the company`s official media representatives and campaign`s ambassadors (such as Olympic sportsmen and their family members) during the Games. Next to that, I planned and led a media trip for 20 top Russian media to the Games and was responsible for its successful execution. As a result of my management, KPI`s for media placement during this media trip were outperformed and a big number of impressions and earned publications was gained.', 'title': 'Senior Public relations specialist in Procter & Gamble (P&G) communications team', 'employment_type': 'Permanent'}]}]
